from t_projdigest
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:

id,
proj_outcome_id,
lob,

is_import,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{projOutcomeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lob,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{projName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{projNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{projBrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{projBeginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{projEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{archivePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{projManagerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{projManageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{projManageEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{projManageTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{industryCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fieldCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{applicationCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{usedLanguage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{systemSoft,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{systemHard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{usedDatabase,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{testFramework,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{keyTechSkills,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isImport,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.select: select distinct lob as lob from t_projdigest

select distinct p.id , proj_outcome_id , lob , proj_name , proj_num , cust_name , proj_brief , proj_begin_date , proj_end_date , archive_path , proj_manager_name , proj_manage_id , proj_manage_email , proj_manage_tel , i.industry industry_category , f.field field_category , a.application application_category , used_language , system_soft , system_hard , used_database , test_framework , key_tech_skills , user_id , is_import from t_projdigest p left join t_industry i on p.industry_category = i.id left join t_field f on p.field_category = f.id left join t_application a on p.application_category = a.id where 1= 1
and p.proj_outcome_id like concat ('%', #{projOutcomeId}, '%')
and p.proj_name like concat ('%', #{projName}, '%')
and p.proj_num like concat ('%', #{projNum}, '%')
and p.lob like concat ('%', #{lob}, '%')
and p.user_id like concat('%', #{userId},'%')
order by proj_outcome_id asc
